column1: Funeral services will be 10:00 A. M. Saturday
column4: in the Chapel of Holman Funeral Home and Cremations in Ozark with Reverend Freddie McCain and Reverend Kenneth Earles officiating.  Interment will follow in Pea River Presbyterian Cemetery in Clio with Holman Funeral Home of Ozark directing. The family will receive friends at the funeral home in Ozark Friday from 5:00 P. M. until 7:00 P. M.
